name: Sydney Markets Collective
tagline: Bringing communities together through curated market experiences
description: We've been organising Sydney's best markets for over 10 years. From intimate neighbourhood markets to large-scale festivals, we create spaces where makers, growers, and creators can connect with their community. Our events prioritise local vendors and sustainable practices.

name: Comic Culture Australia
tagline: Australia's premier pop culture event organizers
description: We create unforgettable pop culture experiences that bring fans together. From comic conventions to gaming expos, our events celebrate the fandoms that make us who we are. We work with international guests, local artists, and passionate vendors to deliver world-class conventions.

name: Green Events Co
tagline: Sustainable events for a better tomorrow
description: Every event we produce prioritises environmental sustainability. From zero-waste markets to eco-conscious festivals, we prove that great events don't have to cost the earth. We partner with environmental organisations and only work with vendors who share our values.

name: Festival Sounds
description: We produce music festivals and live events that showcase the best of Australian and international talent. From boutique acoustic sessions to large-scale multi-day festivals, we create moments that music lovers remember forever.

name: Coastal Markets WA
description: We run markets along Western Australia's stunning coastline, from Fremantle to Margaret River. Our events bring together local artisans, farmers, and food producers in beautiful outdoor settings. Every market is a celebration of the WA lifestyle.

name: AVCon Inc
tagline: South Australia's anime and gaming convention
description: AVCon is a not-for-profit convention celebrating anime, video games, and Japanese culture. Run entirely by volunteers who are passionate about the community, we've been bringing fans together in Adelaide since 2001. Our annual convention features cosplay competitions, gaming tournaments, and international guests.
